text_block_list.text: Hmm... Hmmm... Ohh, what should I<n>do?

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text:
Hey, who's that? Do they need help?<n>I'm gonna go see if I
can lend a hand!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text: Oh, Kitasan? ...Dang, she's pretty light<n>on her feet.

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text:
Hehe. That's Kita for you. Ever since<n>we were young,
she's never been<n>able to turn away from someone in<n>
trouble.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
Since you were young? Oh, so you<n>guys are childhood
friends, huh? In<n>that case, you're both sure to grow<n>by
leaps and bounds.

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text: Hm? Uh, thank you...

Ahhh, the pork cutlet curry has way<n>too many calories... But
I just can't<n>resist that crispy, fluffy goodness...

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text:
If you want to eat it so badly, why<n>hold back? The extra
calories will give<n>you more energy for training!

That's a great point! I think I'll go<n>with the curry so I can
work even<n>harder!

I always have trouble making up my<n>mind, so I appreciate
the push! Umm...

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: Oh! I'm Kitasan Black! I'm new here<n>to the academy!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: I'm Matikanetannhauser! Thanks<n>again, Kita!

text_block_list.name: Daitaku and Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: Tanny-in-the-Hauserrr! Machitaaaan!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Wahhh! You scared me!

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text:
Whatcha got there? Pork cutlet curry?<n>Hmm... The brown
vibe works, but<n>how 'bout adding a tomato salad for<n>a
splash of color?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Oh, tomato! Yeah, making it more<n>colorful would definitely up
the flavor!

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: Check this! I'm gonna add evenmore colors! Ketchup! Mayo!Mustard! Fish eggs! ...Grapes!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Uh-huh, uh-huh... Huh?! That sounds<n>gross!

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text:
Don't hate—let her cook! Why not go<n>all in and make it an
Umasta-worthy<n>rainbow curry?!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Rainbow curry?! C-careful not to<n>overdo it, now...

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text:
Hey, Kita... There's something almost<n>soothing about that
Tannhauser girl,<n>don't you think?

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text:
I was just thinking the same thing!<n>Guess there are people
like her here<n>at Tracen Academy too.

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: Btdubs, now that Tannhauser's here,how about we kick off the grandfinale? I was hoping you could do mea solid, Turbo... Mutter, mutter,mutter...

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text:
Ooh, yeah! That sounds awesome!<n>Gimme a sec to get set
up, 'kay?

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: I've got a bad feeling about this...

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text:
Yo, yo! What's up guuuys! ☆ Who's<n>ready to P-A-R-T-Y?
B-b-boom!

text_block_list.name: Everyone
text_block_list.text: Yeaaah!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Wh-what the heck is this?!

text_block_list.name: Ikuno Dictus
text_block_list.text: It appears to be a DJ kit. When did<n>they set it up?

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text:
Make some noise for Kita and Sato!<n>DJ Helios here, ready
to turn up and<n>lay down some sick beats! Hit it,<n>Turbo! ☆

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: Aye aye, sir! Time to start the music!<n>Clickety-poke!
BOOM! ♪ BOOM! ♪

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text:
Waaaaagh! Yo, Turbo! That's way<n>too loud! I know I said to
"turn up," but<n>still...

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: Urgh...

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: She's down?! S-somebody stop the<n>music!

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: That's easier said than done!

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text: We'll burst our eardrums if we get<n>any closer!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
This is bad! If we don't do something<n>quick, you-know-who
is gonna notice...

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Eek! Palmer, look behind you!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text: Huh? ...Oh.

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text:
Okay, it's way cleaner now! Let's<n>take a break, everyone!
Nice work!

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text:
You know it! We make one heck of a<n>team! Wanna form a
squad? We can<n>be "The Super Trash Troopers ☆" or<n>
something! Woohoo!

text_block_list.name: Ikuno Dictus
text_block_list.text:
Considering we'll be participating in a<n>wide range of
student<n>council-organized activities, I think a<n>more
appropriate name would be "The<n>Community Service Squad
☆."

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
Kitasan, Satono—sorry for getting you<n>guys mixed up in all
this. But I gotta<n>say, I'm impressed. You two've got<n>some
skills.

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text:
You think so? Well, I guess we're<n>used to it. I used to do
volunteer work<n>like this all the time with Dia's family!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
Oh yeah? Your family has a passion<n>for that kind of thing,
Satono?

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text:
Yes. I actually first met Kita while<n>volunteering. It feels so
long ago now.<n>By the way, will you all be okay?<n>Don't
you have races?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, but they've organized our<n>schedule to keep this
community<n>service from interfering with our<n>training, so
we'll manage. Hehe.

text_block_list.name: Kitasan and Satono
text_block_list.text: So carefree...

text_block_list.name: Umamusume's Journal
text_block_list.text:
"My to-do list keeps growing day by<n>day. But it's a lot of
fun. From now on,<n>I'm going to get up early and go<n>
running every morning! ...Unless I<n>snooze too long."
